ygData.subject: Re: Our class
ygData.msgSnippet: I m afraid you re mistaken.  You do get 3 teleport spells at lvl 20, but they are for you only, not a group.  I believe its around lvl 28 or 34 that you get
ygData.messageBody:
I'm afraid you're mistaken. You do get 3 teleport spells at lvl 20, but
they are for you only, not a group. I believe its around lvl 28 or 34 that
you get your first group teleport spell ;)

Talarin, High Elven Wizard

----- Original Message -----
From: Karl Hatteland <karlh@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, April 20, 1999 1:34 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Our class


> From: Karl Hatteland <karlh@...>
>
